title: Stuck on "Authenticating" Loading screen
body: I was just playing a game and when it had finished my client wouldn't load anything so I closed the app, re-opened it and now im just stuck at the "Authenticating" loading screen but my internet is fine. Any solutions?

replies.body: Are you still having this issue?  This can happen if your network is getting blocked from reaching the authentication server.  If it persists, the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help!
